text: Chloe McCarron (born 22 December 1997) is a Northern Irish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Birmingham City in the FA Women's Super League and has appeared for Linfield Ladies and the Northern Ireland women's national team. ==Career== McCarron has been capped for the Northern Ireland national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Northern Ireland women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:FA Women's Super League players Category:Birmingham City W.F.C. players Category:Linfield Ladies F.C. players Category:Women's Premiership (Northern Ireland) players
title: Chloe McCarron
